name: 3 minutes in hell
description:
Game done for the compo of LD51 (Theme: Every 10sec).

Survive 3 min in this shooter.

Every 10 sec, the level gets a new layout and upgrades.

Be in the upgrade areas to get the upgrade after 10sec.

Controls:

WASD/dpad - movement

space/right click - dash

left click - shoot
